mapper.select: select o.order_num, w.ware_date, p.partcode, p.partname, cp.name, e.empl_name,e.empl_email from tbl_part p , tbl_contract c, tbl_company cp, warehousing w, purchase_order o, employee e where p.partcode = c.partcode and c.code = cp.code and c.contractno = o.contract_num and w.order_num = o.order_num and o.empl_num = e.empl_num
